PrecisREGULATIONS AMENDING CERTAIN REGULATIONS (DEPARTMENT OF INDUSTRY) by updating Form 3 (Notice of Registered Office or Notice of Change of Address of Registered Office), Form 17 (Articles of Dissolution) and the Federal Personal Information Bank number in Schedule I.1 to the CANADA BUSINESS CORPORATIONS REGULATIONS, and by revoking subsections 6(4), 7(4), 7(6), 7(7), 9(1), 9(3), 9(5) and 9(6) of the FORMAL DOCUMENT REGULATIONS.
